name: Cat Souls (itch)
description:
- Global Game Jam 2016 -

Cat Souls is a top down 2D action RPG game inspired by Dark Souls, The Binding of Isaac and The Legend of Zelda: A Link to The Past. You play as Luna, a brave warrior cat fighting her way through arenas with enemies that can combine through witchcraft to become chimerical beasts.

Game Design:

Kyuu & Ryuno

Audio:

Thiago Adamo & Ryuno

Art:

Jeison
